Text:
function ERU_EP05_12()
    -- .承-3【2月第2週】「百合愛学園の『姫』たち」
    SaveData.Title = "百合愛学園の『姫』たち"

    -- //BG：メインストリート
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

PLAY_BGM("BGM02.wav",0)

    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、ヒユ（笑顔）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】smile
 "Erika Ikusa, please~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Friendly! Cheerful! Cute! She’s got the whole package!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ga")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0513.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】panic
 "Hey, Lira-chan, this isn’t a supermarket! Please appeal Erika Onee-sama’s charm more seriously!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0981.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】smile
 "Hehe, this time Hiyu-san is right. Please take me as an example." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0982.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】yandere
 "Please support Erika Ikusa. She is graceful, noble, and alluring... she has it all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1446.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】panic
 "No no no! Scary scary scary! That’s not a good example at all!" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2321.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile, sweat
 "Everyone, just a normal appeal is fine, okay?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ While Hermes-san still hadn’t shown up at school, we Erika supporters were all working hard together on promoting the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ One big change had happened so far. ]])

    -- //BU：オウガ（笑顔）、先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0454.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】smile
 "From us guys, we want to ask for your support of Erika." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0127.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】excited
 "We don’t want this forced coeducation either!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0094.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】excited
 "We have no desire to infiltrate Yuriai Private Academy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0136.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】excited
 "Hehe... let’s all get along well... while keeping our distance, though." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ That meant the boys’ division had also joined in the morning appeal activities. ]])

    MSG([[ Until now, they couldn’t join during the busy arrival time when many girls gathered. ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing our earnest efforts, the teachers gave us their permission. ]])

    -- //BU：モブ女性
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB02aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,200,0)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(50,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0022.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Teacher Ito】
 "Good morning, Erika-san. You’re putting in a lot of effort from early on." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2322.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile
 "Good morning, Teacher Ito. Yes, the boys’ division is working hard as well." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Teacher Ito, who had chased after me at the entrance ceremony, looked at the boys. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0023.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Teacher Ito】
 "Erika-san. As an alumna of Yuriai Private Academy, I couldn’t accept the presence of the boys." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0024.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Teacher Ito】
 "I was struggling to somehow drive away the male students who destroyed this school’s long-standing culture. But... I may have been wrong." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("itoh_0025.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Teacher Ito】
 "Because now, Yuriai Private Academy is surely moving in a better direction. If we simply deny the boys unnecessarily..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fc")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2323.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile
 "Yes. Surely that would have led to a different future again. No one knows the right answer." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2324.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】smile
 "But I... no, we believe. That the path we are all walking on now is the best way to improve Yuriai Private Academy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：1F廊下
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG013aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask006" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：ダリア（通常）、モブ女子生徒×２
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0704.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】normal
 "Hey, good day. You all should support Erika-kun as well." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0193.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Daria-sama, do you also support Princess Erika?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("schoolgirl_0194.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Female Student】
 "Have you fallen out with Hermes-sama?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0705.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "It’s not a falling out. I simply believe Erika-kun is more suitable as the 'Battle Princess.'" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ib")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    DARIA_PARTICLE_02(150,600,0,100,500)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0706.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】wink
 "Even Hermes would dislike voting just out of sisterly feelings." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：マリカ（通常）、ダリア（通常）
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0082.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】normal
 "Doing PR alone here? That’s not like you, who loves the spotlight." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0707.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】surprise
 "M-Marika?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0083.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】normal
 "You probably feel guilty about joining us, right? Mina-chan won’t reject you, so be sure to tell him how you feel." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0084.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】normal
 "You know you’ll be forgiven, don’t you?" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0708.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】sadness
 "...Do I really have that right?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0709.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】sadness
 "I once betrayed you, deeply hurt you, and now I interfere with Erika-kun and Armeria’s meetings. I always make the wrong choices." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0710.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】sadness
 "I don’t have the right to join my comrades..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0085.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】smile
 "I remember clearly that while I was asleep, Daria stayed by my side the whole time." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ca")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0711.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】surprise
 "Eh..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0086.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】smile
 "If you’re feeling unsure, I’ll give you that right. Now, tell me." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0087.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】normal
 "What exactly do you want?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0712.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】surprise
 "I..." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01da")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0713.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】sadness
 "Want to return to you all. I don’t want to lose anyone important anymore." ]])

    -- //CI：161
    -- //BU：なし
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"CI161a")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,0,-200)
    LAYER_MOVE_POSITION(60,0,0,500,Ease.OutSine)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0088.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】
 "Then let’s go together. Come on, hold my hand." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0714.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】
 "...Ah. I won’t let go again. Never." ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

    -- //BG：メインストリート
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG019aa")
    -- //BU：リラ（笑顔）、ヒユ（笑顔）、ウラン（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RIR07ea")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask005" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("lira_1445.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Lira】smile
 "Erika Ikusa, please~<sprite="Emoji" name="note"> Friendly! Cheerful! Cute! She’s got the whole package!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_RYU01oa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,-600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0982.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】yandere
 "Please support Erika Ikusa. She is graceful, noble, and alluring... she has it all." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_HIY01mb")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,600,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("hiyu_0514.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Hiyu】excited, nosebleed
 "Please support Erika Onee-sama! Maternal! Bare legs! Beautiful legs! Everything is perfect!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：オウガ（通常）、先輩たち（興奮）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_OGA01aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAA01ma")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,-400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("senpai1_0128.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #1】excited
 "Cute!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai2_0095.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #2】excited
 "Sexy!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("senpai3_0137.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Mask Senpai #3】excited
 "And erotic—ugh!?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("ogre_0455.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Ouga】normal
 "I won’t let you say that, you idiots." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：マリカ（笑顔）、ダリア（笑顔）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_DAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MAR01ea")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("marika_0089.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Marika】smile
 "Please support the cutest cousin in my world!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("dahlia_0715.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Daria】smile
 "Erika-kun is the one who brought me back to the Academy. Everyone, please support him!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：モブ女子生徒×いっぱい
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MOB04aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(50,750,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_MOB05aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(55,450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"BU_MOB06aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(60,150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"BU_MOB07aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(65,-150,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"BU_MOB08aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(70,-450,0)
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"BU_MOB09aa")
    LAYER_POSITION(75,-750,0)
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("mix_0035")
    MSG([[
    【Knights】
 "Please support Erika Onee-sama!" ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(65,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(70,"")
    LAYER_LOAD(75,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

    -- //BU：アキラ・制服（焦り）
    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ga")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ca")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1138.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】uniform, surprise
 "W-Wow, I came to check secretly and it’s really something else here." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01fa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2325.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】wry smile, sweat
 "Yeah. Everyone seems to be going all out promoting on my behalf." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2326.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】tearful smile
 "To have so many friends supporting me... I’m truly happy." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01ka")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1139.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】uniform, smirk
 "That must mean Mina-chin has supported a lot of people too." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1140.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】uniform, smirk
 "Your kindness worried us plenty, but seeing this scene makes me think Mina-chin wasn’t wrong." ]])

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_AKI01eb")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

PLAY_VOICE("akira_1141.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Akira】uniform, smile
 "I’m glad all your hard work has paid off, Mina-chin." ]])


LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ja")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_2327.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】tearful smile
 "...Yeah!" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ ――Two weeks left until the Princess Election. ]])

    MSG([[ Thanks to my reliable friends, I’ve gained support equal to Hermes-san's. ]])

    MSG([[ But it didn’t stay smooth sailing. When that person returns to Yuriai Private Academy, things will turn upside down again. ]])

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
    LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG000aa")
    SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
    WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("ERU_EP05_13")
end
